ISSUE.TITLE: Add null validation for selected culture during installation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to the installtion page in debug mode 2. Do not select any country 3. Click "Install" 4. An exception will be thrown at https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Controllers/InstallController.cs#L237. Although we have an empty "catch" block, a breakpoint pointing to the exception is still set in VS. It can confuse some developers. Let's add a "NullOrEmpty" validation for the "model.Country" value
